dct_title_s: Thacker's reduced survey map of India
dct_description_sm: Cartographic Details: Scale 1:4,435,200. 1 in. = 70 English miles. Relief shown by hachures and spot heights. Insets: Bombay -- Calcutta -- Madras -- Delhi -- [Nicobar Islands] -- [Sea routes to India]. (C) John Bartholomew & Son Ltd.
1 map : color ; 99 x 85 cm, on sheet 107 x 90 cm.
dct_publisher_sm: Thacker, Spink & Co : W. Thacker & Co (Calcutta and London)
